question: I've heard stories about men using a cream called DiabetiDerm from drugstores on their penis to increase blood flow.The cream is made to increase blood flow into feet especially for people who have diabetes for better blood circulation. The main ingredient in the cream is L-Arginine HCL. There are pills on the market that include L-Arginine in their ingredients for men who want a harder penis. Has everyone tried a product like DiabetiDerm on their penis and what were the results if any?
title: Increasing Blood Flow To The Penis
